name: Hyper Snake (Mystical_Pidgeon)
description:
Hyper Snake is a mobile game for Android available on Google Play.

Drag or swipe to direct your snake about the screen. Collect gems to grow longer. Avoid colliding with yourself and hazards. Planets act as bumpers, knocking you around. Collecting enough gems activates HYPER mode which makes you invincible, fast and hungry!
